nodes.text: The Portrait of Axkva Min was a painting depicting the Queen Nightsister, Axkva Min. The Aqualish Dageerin had a copy of this painting in his possession, and later sold it to a Rebel agent who managed to seal her again after gaining her necklace.

The Portrait of Axkva Min appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. The player could buy this painting from Dageerin for 1 Axkva Min Token of Heroism after having completed the Heroic instance.
